title: Replace manual schema-init.ts with Drizzle Kit migrations
description:
Current `db/schema-init.ts` uses raw SQL CREATE TABLE statements. Should use Drizzle Kit migrations per https://orm.drizzle.team/docs/connect-cloudflare-do

Tasks:
1. Add drizzle.config.ts for sqlite-core with DO settings
2. Generate migrations from existing Drizzle schemas (schema-minimal.ts, etc.)
3. Replace initSchema() with migrate() from drizzle-orm/durable-sqlite/migrator
4. Use blockConcurrencyWhile() for safe migration application
5. Delete db/schema-init.ts after migration

Benefits:
- Single source of truth (TypeScript schemas)
- Proper versioned migrations
- ALTER TABLE support for schema evolution
- Better DX with drizzle-kit push/generate
close_reason: Implemented Drizzle Kit migrations in 3 commits
